resources:
SnipBack WELCOME TO SNIPBACK THE WORLD"’"S MOST POWERFUL
RECORD BUTTON SnipBack is loaded with over 40+ features,
but one of the most innovative features is the 
ability to record into the PAST. Whether it’s going back and adding missed
 footage from the beginning of an event, or 
 just waiting for the action to happen first 
and then using our 
exclusive QuickBack feature to go back and get it, SnipBack has
 you covered.
● Highlight Reel Creator
● Cut Zone - Cut Out Unwanted Video
● Add SlowMo & SpeedUp Zones
● All Future Features Included
● No Ads ● Crop Video for Social Media 
● Add Background Music 
● Add Voiceover/
